title: PLU
name: Percentage of Local Usage
definition: Identifies the percent of local usage associated with trun k groups carrying local traffic between a LEC and a CLEC.
usageNotes:
Required when the CC field is populated and the first position of the REQTYP field is "M" and the ACT field is "N", "C" or "R". 
Optional when the CC field is populated and the first position of the REQTYP field is "S" or "L" and the ACT field is "N", "C", "M", "T" or "R". 
Otherwise prohibited.
